mapper.insert: insert into x$statements_with_sorting (db, exec_count, total_latency, sort_merge_passes, avg_sort_merges, sorts_using_scans, sort_using_range, rows_sorted, avg_rows_sorted, first_seen, last_seen, digest, query) values (#{db,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exec_count,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{total_latency,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sort_merge_passes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{avg_sort_merges,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sorts_using_scans,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sort_using_range,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{rows_sorted,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{avg_rows_sorted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{first_seen,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{last_seen,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{digest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{query,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select db, exec_count, total_latency, sort_merge_passes, avg_sort_merges, sorts_using_scans, sort_using_range, rows_sorted, avg_rows_sorted, first_seen, last_seen, digest, query from x$statements_with_sorting
